name: Lisa Karstens
bio: We are excited to share the [“microshades: An R package for improving color accessibility and organization of microbiome data”](https://journals.asm.org/doi/10.1128/MRA.00795-22) has been included into the [Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Collection](https://journals.asm.org/dei-collection) of the American Society for Microbiology Journal.
